law.catch_line: Board to keep record of proceedings and register of applications.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 27, effective January 1, 1999. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1986. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1599e-10.
